website_summaries.verdict: This is a sound choice if you are looking for an inexpensive whitening toothpaste by a trusted brand that produces noticeable results for many consumers.
pros: With a combination of micro-cleansing silica and Whitelock formula, it provides noticeable results for many users plus prevents new stains
An affordable toothpaste by a top brand in dental care
cons: The newly-designed cap is flimsy and hard to close tightly
Some users report less than 90% stain improvement – the percentage touted by the company

customer_reviews.title: This product contains plastic in it
customer_reviews.text: This product contains micro plastics, or microbeads. We must demand that Crest stop putting plastic in its ingredients which is harmful for humans and aquatic life. I would have liked this toothpaste had I not found this out after I bought it and need to return it. PEG-6 is their sneaky way of trying to hide the fact that the ingredients list has plastic in it. PEG stands for polyethylene glycol which is plastic bonded with glycol.
customer_reviews.author: Cav

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste. It truly makes you teeth glamorous white if you use it at least twice a day. Other than that, the toothpaste can sometimes make your teeth/gums sensitive and tinkle when you brush your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Albertson

customer_reviews.title: Short of incredible!
customer_reviews.text: After only one week, I definitely see a difference in my yellow, brown teeth. No matter what I used before for whitening, nothing but strips worked. And frankly, I cannot afford that on a daily basis. After researching, I found that Crest 3D White Luxe Glamorous Toothpaste was given the No. 1 end-of-year "BEST" rating of 2019. Well, they hit it right!! I'll definitely be back for more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toby B

customer_reviews.title: It's Crest Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: What review do you really want here? It's Crest. It's just like other toothpaste but Crest. Flavor is good. Didn't really notice any whitening of my teeth but they also didn't get any less white. As long as it cleans my teeth and doesn't taste like dirt, how much more can you really ask?
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: NOT LIVING UP TO THE HYPE
customer_reviews.text: I’m not seeing major wow’ing whitening and I’ve been using this for several months. My teeth aren’t super stained nor do I smoke or cause any unusual discoloration. I notice a better whiting effect from a good cleaning at the dentist. Not sure why it’s not working as well for me as other reviewers, but being honest it’s just not living up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing flaw detracts from product.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing flaw often produces a tube with cap not lined up properly. After awhile it becomes very difficult to snap it shut. I've gotten it both ways...when its lined up, the cap shuts easily, when it isn't, its a real pain and it feels like the flimsy tube will tear if you try too hard to shut the cap. After awhile you get build-up at the cap and rather than risk tearing the tube, you just leave it unsnapped. Other than that, its a good product.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES S.

customer_reviews.title: A very good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste has a pleasant clean fresh taste. Over time, I have noticed a slight improvement in the whitening of my teeth. IN CONCLUSION... The Crest Twin Pack is a good toothpaste and value. Five out of five stars
customer_reviews.author: A.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find 95% stain removal toothpaste!  BEST toothpaste hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: The 95% stain removal for some reason is impossible to find these days. They are all 80% now. Thanks Amazon for making it available! Great product! Best on the market. My absolute favorite stain removing toothpaste! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine 2

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for years
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any difference from buying it at a store so I believe it to be legit. I have used this product for years. I tried other types from them and glamorous is the only one with the best whitening capability. Good price for two tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Casey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this whitening toothpaste. Could probably have found it for a similar or better price locally.
customer_reviews.author: HMP

customer_reviews.title: Why are they discontinuing
customer_reviews.text: Wondering if this is too abrasive and that's why now the Luxe Glamorous White only claims to remove up to 80% of stains. Get this while you can. I swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Pileggi

customer_reviews.title: Crest is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Crest is the best! There are so many to choose from! In all sorts of flavors and textures. More importantly, it's super safe too use on a 6-12 month old toddler! THANKS CREST TOOTH PASTE!!
customer_reviews.author: GG's BDSM TPE WISH LIST

customer_reviews.title: Great whitening toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I smoke and drink a ton of tea and soda. This is the BEST whitening toothpaste I've found. Ive used it religiously for years.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toothpaste! It works great and leaves your teeth feeling clean and teeth noticeably whiter!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste works so well! My teeth feel clean and look so much better! My teeth have whitened too. The toothpaste doesn’t leave an overpowering flavor also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tacy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend and won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like this toothpaste, it doesn’t white the teeth, and it’s too strong that makes a white line on the inner side of my lips. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small package
customer_reviews.text: It is too small, 99g each, not good deal, from the picture it suppose to be bigger. Trust Crest quality anyway.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toothpaste and it whitens like it says. This is a much better price than I can find available locally so this is a win win in being able to have it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee drinkers rejoice
customer_reviews.text: Pairing this with my electric toothbrush is awesome. I'm a heavy black coffee drinker and have noticed results right away
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable whiteness after using for some time. Good product and highly recommended to maintain white smile.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeeee!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toothpaste I’ve found that I both love the taste and the whitening. I feel like this tooth paste whitens my teeth significantly more than of I use other tooth paste. I definitely highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shania houchens

customer_reviews.title: Whitens without burning
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to toothpaste. Some of the other brands are too harsh and create sores in my mouth. Crest 3D White is just the right strength to whiten without burning.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Gelfand

customer_reviews.title: Good whitening product
customer_reviews.text: Decent price Flavor is meh- mint is overpowering. But it does whiten really well
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Well. FULL SIZED TUBES
customer_reviews.text: Best whitening toothpaste on market. hard to find in stores. price increased on repurchase, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkidog

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the twin but did not live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: WJI

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It’s more like a sweet mint. Helps with staining but doesn’t whiten.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it actually works great! I smoke cigarettes & I'm a daily coffee drinker and this toothpaste does a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: Red hudson

customer_reviews.title: Teeth have been whiter since using
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Breath galore and whiter teeth than before, and I've always used an excellent toothpaste. This is better.
customer_reviews.author: April_H

customer_reviews.title: Only toothpaste I buy
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste out there in my opinion, I wish it would leave your breath fresh for a little longer though
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I used 2x a day for the duration of both tubes and I think my teeth got yellower during this time. Did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday
customer_reviews.text: Gives a good clean feeling. Not sure if it keeps my teeth super white.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Small difference
customer_reviews.text: I see a small difference since I began using this toothpaste
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Good whitening toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Good whitening toothpaste. Had visible results in a week. Little pricy, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and a hell of a lot cheaper that having the dentist do it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmoe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I cant speak on reducing coffee stains or so on but it does give a fresh and clean feeling
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and freshening capability
customer_reviews.text: Great taste have not really compared whitening capability as has only been a couple weeks but long lasting freshness and great taste would highly recommend and good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste, but doesn't whiten
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5 stars if it wasn't labeled as a whitening toothpaste. It just does not whiten at all. Been using for like, 2 months or something and not seeing any difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but now it comes in a smaller size without a smaller price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved this toothpaste I’m happy that I can still purchase it online even though they no longer carry it in stores
customer_reviews.author: Brayant Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Rest whitening glamours and diamond strong are a very good product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Crest toothpaste for awhile now, I am very pleased with this, and the Diamond strong is on my list also as another very pleased Crest product
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My go to toothpaste. Item arrived quickly and as described. Same as store product. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Crest 3D really made a difference !
customer_reviews.text: Crest has a good name and they produce an excellent product. Been buying Crest for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Art C.

customer_reviews.title: Good whitening toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Good whitening toothpaste. No different from the others. I just thought since it costs a little more that it would whiten a little more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My teeth have gotten whiter and definitely recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Huang

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too runny and the caps don’t close easily. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bab

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I’ve only had it for two days!! It’s already shown a huge difference in my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: C Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Whitest teeth toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and delicious flavor keeping my teeth whiter then anyone else’s I know!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Crest 3d luxe
customer_reviews.text: The toothpaste is great but the price is high for 2 small tubes!
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two and only got one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and only received one although I paid for two!
customer_reviews.author: lpsnoop

customer_reviews.title: If you want white teeth, this is the prodcut
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and I have sensitive teeth. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Memonade

customer_reviews.title: Went through a whole tube.  Hardly made my teeth whiter.
customer_reviews.text: Should have not given away my Crest White Strips to my daughter. This toothpaste doesn't hardly do anything. But then again, I'm 55 years old. Maybe that had something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toothpaste! Awesome results
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toothpaste! Awesome results! Was skeptical at first! But three days later brushing twice a day I am impressed! Pretty sure I just found my toothpaste brand for life!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: strong flavor but it works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using various whitening toothpastes for years, mostly Crest versions. Although I haven't tested side by side or anything, my impression is that this is the best yet at getting all the stains off, leaving my teeth looking like I've just had them polished by my hygenist. I'm not sure why extra-whitening toothpastes always have extra-strong flavors. I can barely keep this one in my mouth for 2 minutes. If they toned it down a bit, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Psyphyr

customer_reviews.title: this toothpaste is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stuff!!! I like this. I think it (over time) I am on my third tube has lightened my teeth a little. And I fed think it would be good maintenence after doing the strips. Best whitening toothpaste I have used thus far, Bc I have never noticed a difference with any other kind from crest or any other brand
customer_reviews.author: A. G.

customer_reviews.title: Love Crest safe on teet and gums
customer_reviews.text: When people ask me how I have whitened my teeth I tell them about Crest 3D White Lux toothpaste people think I have had them professionally cleaned. Brush twice, once in the morning and a second time at night and this toothpaste will slowly but surely lighten your teeth color.
customer_reviews.author: LEJTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: It really works! Not harsh like other whitening toothpastes
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this toothpaste for about a year now and really like it. Other whitening toothpastes I've tried are too harsh, too gritty, and sting my gums. This product has a mild minty taste. At my last check up, my dentist asked me if I had my teeth whitened!! I would recommend using the 3D mouthwash along with this product for optimal results. Even though the tube is smaller than other brands, you don't need a huge dollop. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JennDG

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: The 95% is terrible. 90% was great. Can’t find it anymore. 95% is more liquid (i.e. not paste). Tube is smaller and is ridiculously difficult to close. 90% was perfect. Not sure why they switched... Crest is forcing me to switch. Long term customer going away.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Broida

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have quite sensitive enamel, and have tried various of whitening toothpastes even by Crest. But this "Glamorous" kind became my favorite because it doesn't make my teeth even more vulnerable, it removes yellow shade after first brushing making my teeth look brighter and healthier. Also I've noticed it doesn't irritated gums as opposed other whitening toothpastes. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Crest Twin Pack 3D White Luxe Glam White Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for months now and NO DIFFERENCE at all in the shade of my teeth! Disappointing, to be sure! Does not at all live up to ANY of the hype!
customer_reviews.author: Tina the S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this toothpaste! Unsure on whitening capabilities but I like it because it doesn’t burn my mouth like others tooth pastes.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: White teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste for whitening teeth! I bought the Colgate version and this one is better!
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the other versions of 3D white
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong tasting as the other 3D white toothpastes. Feel like I’ve seen a bit of an improvement in whitening.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to supplement my annual white strips treatment. I can see on ohotosnthat mynteeth are whiter. I am 100% satisfied with this iridium and have used many tubes over the last 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Brogley

customer_reviews.title: Really whitens your teeth compared to any other.
customer_reviews.text: Really whitens your teeth compared to any other. It can make my teeth sensitive after a while which I'll sometimes switch with Crest diamond strong
customer_reviews.author: David F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! This was a great deal with quick shipping! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: P Haughey

customer_reviews.title: Greating whitening!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only toothpaste I've ever used that actually works as advertised! My teeth really are whiter.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for brushing teeth and leave my teeth white.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Top toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best whitening toothpaste out right now and it shows after a single use. It is a little more pricey, but it works 100%
customer_reviews.author: DCal62

customer_reviews.title: Big money. Little product.
customer_reviews.text: Tiny tube. Will buy at my local department store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice toothpaste!  Removes stains and tastes better than most, without burning your mouth!
customer_reviews.text: Nice toothpaste! It really removes stains and tastes better than most, without burning your mouth!
customer_reviews.author: sunnyskies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does help me keep my teeth white; it does make a difference.

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: My favorite toothpaste. It is the only toothpaste that seems to help keep my teeth white.

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. It works well. It's makes your teeth white. Use it, use it now!
customer_reviews.author: marcisaninja

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Favorite toothpaste- fresh and clean feel. No slimy or gritty feel after brushing. Great taste and leaves fresh breath. Entire family prefers this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of tea daily and I noticed a moderate difference. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: This is always a classic. Gentle & comfortable in the mouth.
customer_reviews.text: This is always a classic. Gentle & comfortable in the mouth. No burning or sensitivity.

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Very very very small tubes. I had to add in to get to a certain amount of money Never again

customer_reviews.title: Love my pearly whites!
customer_reviews.text: Best toothpaste around! My pearly whites love this product! Delivered super quick to my door! Easier than heading to the grocery store!

customer_reviews.title: Good but formula changed
customer_reviews.text: Good, but formula changed. Not like the last one, but good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best teeth whitening tooth paste on the market! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were bigger tubes but works great and the taste is refreshing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked and did what it was supposed to do. Thank You

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and my favorite stuff. Love how it makes my teeth lol and feel

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Love this and I've not seen this style in stores

customer_reviews.text: This is a really good deal for the price. I have noticed my teeth becoming white with every use! Best Buy in my opinion.

customer_reviews.text: Good taste just makes your mouth filmy and teeth sensitive.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel like it cleans my mouth. Very thin and watery product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really whitens your teeth in less than five days

customer_reviews.title: Look at the OZ size...small
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look at the oz's and received tubes a bit bigger than travel size. Not their fault but still LOOK AT THE OZ SIZE!
customer_reviews.author: Omar

product_meta.title: Crest Twin Pack 3D White Luxe Glamorous White Toothpaste, 3.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Reveal a whiter, brighter smile with Crest 3D White Luxe Glamorous White Toothpaste. Its unique foam-action formula surrounds teeth with teeth whitening agents, so every brushing gives you that all-around clean feeling. Proven to remove up to 95% of surface stains in just 3 days, 3D White Luxe Glamorous White Toothpaste is your ticket to a head-turning white smile.
feature_bullets: Removes up to 95% of surface stains in 3 days
Enamel safe fluoride toothpaste to help prevent cavities
